content: knitted vest for men in drops nepal the piece is worked bottom up in stocking stitch pattern ne-376 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 400-450-450-500-550-600 g colour 0206 beige **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
